content.raw:
When downloading Dedalus, there is a script in examples/ivp/2d\_rayleigh\_benard called “rayleigh\_benard.py” which has a few bugs. I downloaded and installed Dedalus version 2.1810 on 2019/09/23.

‌

The first issue is in line 134 which reads “while solver.proceed:” which causes this error:

‌

AttributeError: 'InitialValueSolver' object has no attribute 'proceed'

‌

I fixed this issue by changing line 134 to read “while solver.ok:”

‌

The second issue is that then the solver only ran to 10 iterations instead of to the specified stopping simulation time. I fixed this by adding two lines which explicitly set the stopping wall time and iterations to be infinite:

‌

solver.stop\_wall\_time = np.inf

solver.stop\_iteration = np.inf

‌
